wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Groom Parham  (25 June 1883 – 8 January 1961) was an English Anglican bishop who was bishop of Reading (a suffragan bishop in the Diocese of Oxford) from 1942 until 1954.

response: *1954 (ret.)1961 (d.): Arthur Parham, retired Bishop suffragan of Reading
*1942–1954 (res.): Arthur Parham, Bishop suffragan of Reading
** 2 May: The Suffragan office of Bishop of Reading is revived, Arthur Parham being consecrated.

Faulks married Bridget Marigold Bodley (d. 1963) in 1940; they had two sons and a daughter. In 1967, Faulks remarried to Elizabeth Parham, widow of the Rt Rev Arthur Parham, MC, Bishop of Reading. She died in 1982.
